header.subtitle: We don't use simple videos. We transform human movement into pure mathematical data to train an unprecedented artificial intelligence.

core.title: Computer Vision & Landmarks
core.description:
At the heart of the system is an advanced engine that tracks key points for each hand and facial structure.

When you upload a video, we don't look at your image. The algorithm only extracts the (X, Y, Z) coordinates of the joints. It is this digital skeleton that the AI learns to read.

list.privacy: Privacy by Design (Data anonymized at source)

data_problem.title: The Data Problem
data_problem.desc: AI learns from examples. For English there are billions of texts, for Sign Language datasets were scarce and fragmented. We had to create a new one.

crowdsourcing.title: Crowdsourcing
crowdsourcing.desc: We realized we couldn't do it alone. This platform turns every user into a "teacher" for the machine.

training.title: Training Loop
training.desc: Every validated video enters the training loop, improving the model's recognition capability.

cta.title: Be part of progress
